ENTRY.refkeywords: histogram grid bin count frequency graph 1d array
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Create a 1D histogram from a binned grid and array of samples

DESC.PARA: The histogram1d command returns a histogram array from an array of samples and a binned grid.

LIST.ITEM: xlo - array of lower bin edges
xhi - array of upper bin edges

SYNTAX.LINE: sherpa> n = histogram1d( vals, lo, hi )

DESC.PARA: A 1d histogram is stored in the blank data set created by the dataspace1d and set_dep commands.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
